title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting P2 and attempting to close it, the 'Open' option remains available instead of changing to 'Close'.
EB: When selecting a project that is already open, the 'Open' option should change to 'Close' to allow for closing the project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create two projects P1 and P2. 
2. Select P2. 
3. Attempt to close P2 and observe that the 'Open' option remains available instead of changing to 'Close'.
